About Work

Background

I've worked with big companies from NYRR to Jet.com, leading the email production of campaigns sent daily and seen by thousands. From leading a company's email system transition to using responsive, mobile friendly email templates to debugging and ensuring emails render the same across email clients to supporting customized webfont usgage and retina images in email designs, I have a multitude of HTML email experience.
